title: Sourcegraph enhances the intelligence and speed of their AI-powered coding assistant with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Sourcegraph enhances the intelligence and speed of their AI-powered coding assistant with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Sourcegraph’s AI coding assistant, Cody, uses Claude 3 Sonnet as the default large language model for the free plan, delivering suggestions twice as fast with increased accuracy for developers.
